name: Blood Fuels The Devil
description:
This is my first game, for my first game jam so the game's pretty basic :)

You kill Goblins by touching them . Dead Goblins leave blood. Collect enough blood to stay alive and kill the goblins ahead . You win if you reach till the end of the path and you lose if a Goblin ahead reaches the end.

  • Controls
    • WASD - Move Golem
    • R - Restart
    • Esc - Exit

------------------------------------Credits--------------------------------------------
